document_data.name: Durgrace
document_data.mainbody: '''Durgrace''' was a rare species of [[fish]] that inhabited the [[Lake Glorfindar]] in the [[Starmetal Hills]] and remained active through the winter months under the lake's ice.
document_data.Description: This fish was considered to be a lucky catch due to its growth. Durgrace could grow to a massive size, a lake monster and a fisher's dream.
document_data.Ecology: They were edible and were a part of a winter's hero's feasts served during the annual [[Simril]] celebration in [[Twilight Tor]]. The feast also consisted of cooked [[brown bream]], [[blackjaw]], and [[candlefish]].
